body:
I have a cmake build which uses a module package in `packages.yaml` which fails (in the cmake configuration phase). If I source the environment `spack-build-env.txt` I see that the module looks loaded, however the build is still broken (as expected). However, if I unload and reload the module the cmake configuration works properly. Comparing the outputs of `declare -px` from the before and after state I see there are a few differences including the `CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH`.

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install pumi simmodsuite=full
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->
```console
$ spack --debug --stacktrace install pumi simmodsuite=full
lib/spack/spack/main.py:766 ==> [2020-04-07-14:22:38.932338, 23890] ChildError: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    'cmake' '/tmp/mersoj/spack-stage/spack-stage-pumi-2.2.2-gb33fc47ibjm54msos5w4wz6rsu6hpgy/spack-src' '-G' 'Unix Makefiles' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX:STRING=/lore/mersoj/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/pumi-2.2.2-gb33fc47ibjm54msos5w4wz6rsu6hpgy' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE:STRING=RelWithDebInfo' '-DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE:BOOL=ON' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH_USE_LINK_PATH:BOOL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_INSTALL_RPATH:STRING=/lore/mersoj/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/pumi-2.2.2-gb33fc47ibjm54msos5w4wz6rsu6hpgy/lib;/lore/mersoj/spack/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/pumi-2.2.2-gb33fc47ibjm54msos5w4wz6rsu6hpgy/lib64;/opt/scorec/spack/install/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/mpich-3.3-diz4f6ieln25ouifyc7ndtqlfksom6nb/lib' '-DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH:STRING=/opt/scorec/spack/install/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/mpich-3.3-diz4f6ieln25ouifyc7ndtqlfksom6nb;/opt/scorec/spack/install/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/cmake-3.15.4-kgiql7dd2gdqhpeff7uae74h5uslkert;None' '-DSCOREC_CXX_WARNINGS=OFF' '-DENABLE_ZOLTAN=OFF' '-DCMAKE_C_COMPILER=/opt/scorec/spack/install/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/mpich-3.3-diz4f6ieln25ouifyc7ndtqlfksom6nb/bin/mpicc' '-DCMAKE_CXX_COMPILER=/opt/scorec/spack/install/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/mpich-3.3-diz4f6ieln25ouifyc7ndtqlfksom6nb/bin/mpic++' '-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=OFF' '-DCMAKE_Fortran_COMPILER=/opt/scorec/spack/install/linux-rhel7-x86_64/gcc-7.3.0/mpich-3.3-diz4f6ieln25ouifyc7ndtqlfksom6nb/bin/mpif90' '-DPUMI_FORTRAN_INTERFACE=OFF' '-DMDS_ID_TYPE=int' '-DSKIP_SIMMETRIX_VERSION_CHECK=OFF' '-DMESHES=/tmp/mersoj/spack-stage/spack-stage-pumi-2.2.2-gb33fc47ibjm54msos5w4wz6rsu6hpgy/spack-src/pumi_meshes' '-DENABLE_SIMMETRIX=ON' '-DSIM_PARASOLID=ON' '-DSIM_ACIS=ON' '-DSIM_DISCRETE=ON' '-DSIM_MPI=mpich3.3'

```

### Information on your system

<!-- Please include the output of `spack debug report` -->
* **Spack:** 0.14.1-516-1249d73
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-skylake

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->
`packages.yaml` (relevant portion)
```yaml
packages:
  all:
    compiler: [gcc@7.3.0]
    target: [x86_64]
    providers:
      mpi: [mpich]
  simmetrix-simmodsuite:
    modules:
      simmetrix-simmodsuite@14.0-190617dev+base+parasolid+acis+discrete+abstract+adv+advmodel+import+paralleladapt+parallelmesh^mpich@3.3%gcc@7.3.0: simmetrix-simmodsuite/14.0-190617dev-ae6g3fy
    buildable: False
```


### Additional information

- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output

Note that the modules I am loading are part of an external spack installation located at  `/opt/scorec/spack/`

1. After sourcing `spack-build-env.txt`: [spack_orig_env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4446408/spack_orig_env.txt)
2. After sourcing `spack-build-env.txt` and reloading the `simmetrix-simmodsuite` module: [spack_unload_reload_module.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4446409/spack_unload_reload_module.txt)
title: module package not properly loading all environment variables
